name: Astronomer
passive: Gain advantage when using a map to locate items

abilities.1: Always know the direction of north
abilities.2: Retrace your steps to find the path
abilities.3: Gain advantage when navigating spacecraft or seacraft
abilities.4: Gain advantage on dexterity checks in unexplored places
abilities.5: Once per month, your sense of direction draws you toward fortune

description: Blackridge's observatory scholars read the fractured skies and guide caravans through the Rift, turning starlight into hidden roads to fortune.

name: Doctor
passive: Famed for a signature cure known across Blackridge

abilities.1: Party members regain double HP when recovering
abilities.2: Gain advantage when stabilizing unconscious individuals
abilities.3: Gain advantage when finding cures for familiar people
abilities.5: Once per month, find a cure without a roll

description: In the clinic wards of Blackridge, doctors are revered lifesavers whose breakthroughs keep miners and militia on their feet.

name: Creative
passive: A signature style earns renown in Blackridge's artisan quarter

abilities.1: Art sways emotions; gain advantage on persuasion and deception
abilities.2: Gain advantage when seeking buyers, venues, or collaborators
abilities.3: Once per month, gain inspiration for a performance
abilities.4: Once per month, craft a legendary masterpiece
abilities.5: Receive exclusive invites and gain a new artistic proficiency

description: Blackridge thrives on creatives whose performances sway guild politics and spark underground movements.

name: Software Engineer / Mathematician
passive: Gain advantage when crafting algorithms or code

abilities.1: Make skill rolls with objects without spending actions
abilities.2: Create and sell functional apps and algorithms
abilities.3: Gain advantage when identifying issues with puzzles or machines
abilities.5: Encode and decode secret messages with math and code

description: Behind Blackridge's data vaults, these tech masters weave algorithms that safeguard secrets and decode ancient tech.

name: Engineer
passive: Engineering credentials grant access to Blackridge corporate labs

abilities.1: Builds cost half the normal amount
abilities.2: Patent and sell your own builds
abilities.3: Armor repairs add an extra d4 armor points
abilities.4: Gain advantage when crafting a specialized item
abilities.5: Specialized item builds take half the time and successes

description: From the workshops of Blackridge, engineers forge siege engines and civic marvels that keep the city running.

name: Bounty Hunter
passive: Detect high-value bounties when entering establishments

abilities.1: Gain advantage when tracking living targets
abilities.2: Ignore called shot penalties against bounties
abilities.3: Gain advantage on speech checks with law enforcement
abilities.5: Rates are doubled and bounty gear costs 25% less

description: Blackridge's bounty hunters prowl alleyways and spacelanes, licensed to haul in the city's most wanted.

name: Mechanic
passive: Fix any item once per day without parts or tools

abilities.1: Gain advantage on repairs in high-stakes situations
abilities.2: Repair rolls may enhance or weaken the item
abilities.3: Gain advantage when modifying repaired items
abilities.5: Take an extra roll on the crafting table once per day

description: Blackridge mechanics resurrect rusted relics and keep the city's convoy fleets rolling.

name: Scrapper
passive: Scrap without tools and chance to find rare items

abilities.5: Find cleanup and salvage jobs easily

description: Blackridge scrap yards breed scrappers who turn wreckage into riches and sniff out hidden valuables.

name: Miner
passive: Sell raw materials at a 20% premium

abilities.1: Estimate resource value of terrain by panning
abilities.2: Gain +1 Constitution from harsh work environments
abilities.3: Gain advantage when bartering for items or land
abilities.4: Chance to find treasure while mining
abilities.5: Always find contracts for mining or logistics

description: The mines beneath Blackridge spawn miners tough enough to haul ore and lucky enough to strike hidden veins.

name: Entrepreneur

abilities.1: Reduce service costs by 10% for up to ten businesses
abilities.2: Forge contracts using the crafting table
abilities.5: Earn 10% of all marketed business income

description: Entrepreneurs work Blackridge's markets and guild halls, wheeling deals that ripple across the frontier.

name: Hustler
passive: Gain advantage in games of chance and can always double or nothing

abilities.1: Gain advantage on stealth rolls when plans go sideways
abilities.3: Gain advantage on pickpocketing after playing games
abilities.4: Always spot other hustlers without rolling
abilities.5: Insight checks against you have disadvantage

description: Blackridge's gambling dens crown hustlers who read tells and slip past the law.

name: Adventurist
passive: Once per day, gain advantage on a dexterity check

abilities.2: Reroll any roll once per day
abilities.3: Ignore dexterity-based disadvantage once per day
abilities.4: Give your party temporary HP with a pre-battle speech

description: Adventurists roam Blackridge and beyond, chasing relic rumors and rallying crews for perilous expeditions.
